author: "airline OR airlines OR airways" - Google News
title: Air France KLM unit in $500 million maintenance deal with Vietnam Airlines
text:
March 27, 2018 / 3:22 AM / a day ago Air France KLM unit in $500 million maintenance deal with Vietnam Airlines Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
HANOI (Reuters) - Vietnam Airlines has awarded Air France Industries KLM Engineering & Maintenance a $500 million contract to provide aircraft maintenance service to Vietnamese airline, it said in a statement. An aircraft of Vietnam Airlines flies over corn farm while landing at Noi Bai airport in Hanoi, Vietnam November 21, 2016. REUTERS/Kham 
Under the contract signed in Paris on Monday, AFI KLM E&M, a unit of Air France KLM group, will handle maintenance of Vietnam Airlines’ 787 GEnx engines for 12 years, Vietnam Airlines said. 
The country’s flag carrier said it aims to raise its fleet of Boeing 787s to 19 by 2021. Reporting by Khanh Vu; Editing by Eric Meijer
